zh.wechat_info_text: 点击右上角按钮，然后在弹出菜单中，点击在浏览器中打开，即可下载安装
zh.title: 数字货币抵押贷款
zh.t_first: 数字资产抵押，1小时极速放款
zh.t_second: 支持ETH、ETC智能合约抵押贷款
zh.t_third: 最高可贷金额500万，最长可贷期限90天
zh.wechat_1: 请添加唯一官方客服微信号
zh.webo_1: 请关注唯一官方客服微博

en.wechat_info_text: Click the button in the top right corner, then click Open  in browser in the pop-up menu to download and install
en.title: Digital currency mortgage
en.t_first: Digital asset mortgage, loan paid in 1 hour
en.t_second: Support ETH, ETC smart contract mortgage
en.t_third: Maximum loanable amount: 5 million, maximum loan period: 90 days
en.wechat_1: Please add the only official WeChat customer service account
en.webo_1: Please follow the only official Weibo customer service account
